description: Provide captions, transcripts, and descriptions for media content.
recommendation: Add captions, transcripts, and audio descriptions for prerecorded and live media. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.2.1,1.2.2,1.2.3,1.2.4,1.2.5)
algorithm: Flags audio/video lacking caption tracks or nearby transcript links, and videos missing description tracks/links.
algorithm_advanced: Requires caption tracks or nearby transcript links for audio/video; requires description tracks/links for video.
